name: Cenarius' Guidance
description:
Incarnation: Tree of Life
During Incarnation: Tree of Life, you gain Clearcasting every 5 sec. The cooldown of Incarnation: Tree of Life is reduced by 2.0 sec when Lifebloom blooms and 1.0 sec when Regrowth's initial heal critically strikes.

 Convoke the Spirits
Convoke the Spirits' cooldown is reduced by 50% and its duration and number of spells cast is reduced by 25%. Convoke the Spirits has an increased chance to use an exceptional spell or ability.
